text:
The white Tea Lemon Tea Simply refreshing.
Superb staff service. He Even come back to ask if i like the tea like i wanted.
Affordable price.
Cool ambience and feel green.

Lemoontea is not your ordinary milk tea shop. They offer a wide variety of drinks and some odd cocktails such as coconut milk mixed with watermelon or coconut water mixed with mint. Personally I love the different flavours I get to experience at this place.

I liked their signature green tea with lemon. The guy at the counter was kind enough to tell me about the promotion they were having to buy one and get one for free. This review is for his good service and honesty.

The tea is nice.... got a Peach Oolong lemon tea... strange combination but turn out not bad... not the super fantastic but yet to try other favour...
Place is clean and nice.. love the colour of the store and how is presented... sat there drinking and feels quite therapeutics.. nice colour

Well branded and interesting menu at first glance. Unfortunately, quality of the tea (at least the one I chose) did not live up to expectation. Ordered the jasmine lemon tea. The after taste is sooooo synthetic! Both the lemon and jasmine donâ€™t feel authentic at all. Tasted like I was drinking air freshener. Also, more than half the drink was ice cubes. Ridiculously overpriced. Sticking to my chi cha and koi.
